    public class DriverMapActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback, RequestCallbackListener, ScanQRDialog.OnFragmentInteractionListener, AccountCallbackListener, com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView.OnNavigationItemSelectedListener
    Android Activity that displays the Driver's Map. Allows Drivers to accept requests, pick up riders, drop them off, and receive payment
